org.apache.ignite.ml.math

Class Tracer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.ml.math.Tracer

  • public class Tracer
extends Object
    Utility methods to support output of Vector and Matrix instances to plain text or HTML.

        public static void showHtml(Matrix mtx)
                     throws IOException
        Shows given matrix in the browser with D3-based visualization.
        Parameters:
        mtx - Matrix to show.
        Throws:
        IOException - Thrown in case of any errors.

      • showHtml

        public static void showHtml(Matrix mtx,
                            boolean useAsciiFallback)
                     throws IOException
        Shows given matrix in the browser with D3-based visualization.
        Parameters:
        mtx - Matrix to show.
        useAsciiFallback - Use ascii fallback is desktop or browser is unavailable.
        Throws:
        IOException - Thrown in case of any errors.

      • showHtml

        public static void showHtml(Matrix mtx,
                            Tracer.ColorMapper cm)
                     throws IOException
        Shows given matrix in the browser with D3-based visualization.
        Parameters:
        mtx - Matrix to show.
        cm - Optional color mapper. If not provided - red-to-blue (R_B) mapper will be used.
        Throws:
        IOException - Thrown in case of any errors.
